text: The Tōzai Line (東京メトロ東西線,とうきょうメトロとうざいせん) is a metro line of Tokyo Metro in Tokyo, Japan. == Stations == * ▲: Tōyō Rapid, Rapid and Commuter Rapid trains pass * ■: Tōyō Rapid and Rapid trains
